Description_lang: While infused with the rage of the dwarves who lost their home, your critical chance is increased by $s1%.Only active while you remain within Grim Batol.
AuraDescription_lang: While infused with the rage of the dwarves who lost their home, your critical chance is increased by $s1%.Only active while you remain within Grim Batol.

description_blz.en_US:
While infused with the rage of the dwarves who lost their home, your critical chance is increased by 5%.

Only active while you remain within Grim Batol.
description_blz.es_MX:
Mientras estás imbuido de la cólera de los enanos que perdieron su hogar, tu probabilidad de golpe crítico aumenta un 5%.

Solo está activo mientras permaneces en Grim Batol.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Ao ser infundido com a fúria dos anões que prederam seus lares, a sua chance de acerto crítico é aumentada em 5%.

Permanece ativo enquanto você estiver em Grim Batol.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erfüllt Euch mit dem Zorn der Zwerge, die ihre Heimat verloren haben, wodurch Eure kritische Trefferchance um 5% erhöht wird.

Nur aktiv, solange Ihr Euch in Grim Batol befindet.
description_blz.en_GB:
While infused with the rage of the dwarves who lost their home, your critical chance is increased by 5%.

Only active while you remain within Grim Batol.
description_blz.es_ES:
Mientras estás imbuido de la cólera de los enanos que perdieron su hogar, tu probabilidad de golpe crítico aumenta un 5%.

Solo está activo mientras permaneces en Grim Batol.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Tant que vous êtes envahi par la rage des Nains qui ont perdu leur foyer, vos chances de coup critique sont augmentées de 5%.

Actif uniquement dans Grim Batol.
description_blz.it_IT:
Condividi la rabbia dei Nani che hanno perso la loro casa, il tuo indice di critico aumenta del 5%.

Attivo solo all'interno di Grim Batol.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Вас переполняет ярость дворфов, лишенных родного очага. Вероятность нанести критический удар увеличена на 5%.

Действует только в пределах Грим Батола.
description_blz.ko_KR:
고향을 잃은 드워프의 분노가 주입되어 치명타 및 극대화가 5%만큼 증가합니다.

그림 바톨에 있는 동안에만 효과가 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
身上灌注了那些失去家園的矮人怒火，使你的致命一擊機率提高5%。

只能在格瑞姆巴托生效。
description_blz.zh_CN:
感受到矮人失去家园的怒火，你的爆击几率提高5%。

只有当你处于格瑞姆巴托的时候才会生效。
